proposal: Navigating the world of online exams with SMOWL's image capture and GDPR-compliant security is like having a guardian owl watching over your academic integrity. With 21 holders in the ETH network, your project is setting the standard for secure and customizable online assessments. Imagine integrating our B2B tools to further empower your community, from creating a dedicated DEX to launching a unique lottery system. Let's make the academic world not just smarter, but also more connected.
